website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable chair perfect for kids of varying heights.
pros: Anti-slip foot covers protect floors and keep noise to a minimum
Adjustable chair caters to students of all heights
Sturdy enough to hold an adult
cons: Chairs sit at a higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy, easy to assemble. Perfect for 8 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy, fits my 8 year old grandson perfectly. Easy to put together. Nice black finish. Seat is perfect for a child, but I think it would be too short for an adult; the seat hits me in the middle of the underside of my thigh, so not a good fit for me; I am 5'8, with normal length legs. Under my grandson's legs is a homemade foot rest which he likes to fiddle with while we do school work. Without the foot rest, the seat is adjusted too high, however, it is now adjusted perfectly for work on his laptop for school.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Love This Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my children and my kiddos act like a bunch of circus monkeys. In particular, my son is always leaning back with his chair and constantly putting his full weight on only one end of the base of the chair. I can genuinely vouch for these as all my children use them constantly w/their desk for school projects and such. I have owned a few of these chairs for about a year and they have been sturdy. I would definitely recommend them for a student of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: merleharlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly strong, sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: These seats are tremendous!! The are so strong and sturdy. I'm a large man, about 280, and I can sit in one while showing my daughter schoolwork instructions, and it feels completely solid. The install instructions were ok, not super, but follow-able. Would 100% recommend. I was looking for a metal frame chair that will last, and this fits that perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: xerostatic

customer_reviews.title: solid sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for desk chairs without wheels for my kids. Not easy to find! And at this price, these chairs are a steal. These chairs are so solid. They are perfect for my toddler boys because the height is adjustable. It is also comfortable for me to occasionally sit in (I would not recommend this chair for an adult, unless you have a very small frame). The manufacturer made assembly super easy to follow. Even all the screws were black, so the chair looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chair for my 9 year old. He was almost able to assemble it on his own. The directions were simple enough for him to understand. I took off a star because he struggled with assembling the base. When putting the seat holders into the base, you have to slide them into these plastic pieces. I assisted after he struggle for awhile. I had to stretch the plastic pieces in order for the seat holders to slide in. Screwing these pieces together also took time. Hopefully we won’t have to adjust the heigh because I won’t look forward to that. Overall he’s satisfied with the chair and says it’s very comfortable he just wishes it had arm rests.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena E

customer_reviews.title: Most practical chair for school
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the prettiest chair, but it has certainly been the most practical. I needed a stationary adjustable chair for my five-year-old for our homeschool because the cute swivel chair she had was a nightmare. She needed a chair that wouldn’t continually move as she was working at her table and one that could grow with her. I bought this chair a year ago, and now I need to purchase a second for my son. My husband even used this chair while working from home this summer! It’s a sturdy, solid chair.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Lou Melon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stable
customer_reviews.text: It is a very comfortable chair though it might not look it. It feels very sturdy and stable and the height can be adjusted which is really nice. Assembling the chair is pretty basic and easy, simple and short instructions. It came with a little metal piece I assume is supposed to somehow be used on the phillips head screws, but I couldn't figure it out. I just used a phillips head screwdriver. It comes with an allen wrench for the 8 bigger screws. The chair seemed a little scuffed and beat up so I am guessing it was a return, but doesn't seem to have any other issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: I like this chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a good price and very sturdy as long as you don't put it on the highest setting. If you do, the seat will rock back and forth making it wobble and scare you like you're going to fall. I tightened it many times and finally gave up and put it on the 2nd to highest setting and the problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but really good quality chair. I like that you can adjust the height to two sizes so it will grow with your kid. I wouldn't suggest this chair for kids not in the 1st grade on up because its kind of tall but not suitable for past 5th grade (maybe 4th) either. Heavy and sturdy I'm not concerned with this chair toppling over or breaking apart. Pricey but if you want to invest in a solid kids chair you can have for the next few years this is it and I would buy this chair again.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover99a

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I really love these chairs, I ended up buying a second one a few months later. There are certainly nicer chairs out there, but not at this price point (or anywhere close to it). I bought them for my kids' desks because I wanted something sturdy, with no wheels, and no spinning. These were perfect. I regularly use my daughter's desk and char too, and it is comfortable and sturdy. It's easy to put together, and no sign of the screws getting loose in the past 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very quick & east assemble plus sturdy. I purchased for my 90lb son..and I tried it out at 150lbs...Chair does not wobble and the material is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for childrens' desks. Thought it would be better to give them a near-standard sized desk and get a chair that will grow with them. This fit the bill. I assembled 2 so once I got in synch with the directions it went together easily enough, although it took me a minute to understand the directions. I really like that they don't have wheels - which just distract the children!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Durham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids desks
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these chairs for my 2, 5, and 8 year old’s desks. I wanted something that was durable and wouldn’t tip over easily. They fit the bill perfectly. No one has tipped over yet. I also love that they have adjusting heights. So the chair will grow with each child.
customer_reviews.author: WattsBuzzin

customer_reviews.title: Instal trick. Love our chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs! Had some trouble putting in the chair seat stand (L shapped metal bars). But, by 4th chair figured out an easy trick (see video). Also, the bolts and screws took a bit of effort to go in sometimes, but it made me feel that it will take a bit of effort for them to loosen. So, it was good. It comes with the tols you need to instal, but it was easier to use my own screwdriver and bits. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for adults and kids alike
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so nice that I bought it twice. Everyone from 3 to 103 can use this chair, thanks to the ability to adjust the height. It is very sturdy, unlike most folding chairs. It's also easy to adjust for height, though it's not something you want to do daily. We use one of the chairs with an adjustable desk so we can keep the height of the chair the same for everyone. Instructions were very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Shellyann Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair a lot. It suits my second grader just fine. One thing I didn't like is I couldn't get the chair legs to sit evenly on the floor. Even with unscrewing the shorter leg all the way out, it still wobbled so I folded a pice of cardboard and taped it over the shorter leg and now it's steady. Aside from that it fits perfectly with the desk that came with it. My child can now do homework in her room away from distractions. It occupies a very small space altogether. You can barely notice it on the room. It's functional. I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judi O

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. There were no instructions at all. There is one thin bar that should be installed under the seat portion while screwing in the leg supports. Would have been nice to have instructions. Has adjustable feet on bottom...not sure if I have the legs put on right. Chair is unlevel and shouldn’t be. Maybe the adjustable feet go on the front of the chair, not the back?
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chair for small spaces... not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was assembled in about 10 minutes after all the parts were laid out... I used my own screwdriver as the little thing they included was not adequate. I am 5'9, 250lbs and this chair is very strudy. I needed a small chair to fit my desk in a small space and this was perfect. Pleased with purchase, will only update review only if it disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Good small chair for a small desk.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase three of these in one order. They were the right height for my daughters three desks. They were exactly what I was looking for. Two has small white blemishes on the seats but nothing to really worded about. One out of the three chairs had a wobble issue. I had to unscrew the knob at the bottom almost all the way out before it was level. With constant movement the knob will likely fall off since it had to be unscrewed almost all they way that's is really the only downside of my purchase. For $25 per chair, you would expect them to be at least mostly leveled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to assemble. Very comfortable too. The only issue we have is that there’s no mid bar for kids to rest their feet so I added a blue band. Even so the band isn’t helping much because it’s too far from reach. Over all kids love their chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is quite solid and appears like it will last. It is easy to adjust to go along with the desk. For under $100 for the pair, I am happy. The chair was easier to assemble than the desk and didn't require any manipulation.
customer_reviews.author: roadbikejamaal

customer_reviews.title: Good chair to match student desks at home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, strong construction with steel frame and hard plastic seat plate and back. It is sized just right for students from elementary through high school. I have my 13 years-old student assembled the chair out of the box, and he was very satisfied with the comfort, in the first day of school.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Breath - Fast Run

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for kids! I spray painted mine to go with desk. Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: dee Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got one of these, after assembly, the chair was wobbly. One "leg" was shorter than the other. Talk to the seller, return it and got another one. The second chair was perfect. sturdy, strong and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Abdiel

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect chair for a child or teenager to use with their desk. It is adjustable for their height, and is extremely sturdy. I love that I found a “student style” chair with no wheels, etc. It is very easy to put together, and overall, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I've now bought two of them. It's comfortable and adjustable to get that perfect height. It's very sturdy and solid. My husband is 300 lbs. and he's even comfortable in it and doesn't feel like it's going to break. I use one as a vanity chair in the bathroom because I have a bad back and need the support.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Nice functional and heavier than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: We ended up liking these better than we thought. They work. They have held up to the kids leaning over back and sides - even tho we do ask them not to do that. Time will tell on the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. But therr were a few issues putting it together and we couldnt gey it to adjust at all. But my kid in rough on furniture and its held up well as a desk chair for now. Id give it 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mack

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it feels great to sit on. It seems small for some one like me (6'2") but it still feels comfortable. I'm using it with my little study desk on the lowest height.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk chair for the price. My son needed a decent chair for his desk and this fit the bill. It’s obviously not an ultra lux high quality leather chair, but it’s perfect for a child while doing homework.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: It is a really good sitting chair and it grows with him.
customer_reviews.text: It have a little rub damage to it. I did not return because my grandson's visit is limited and we needed to use it as I teach him during this summer so that he could sit up properly in a chair that fit him while learning and eating at a smaller table I have for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jaedy

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these chairs, and after seeing how sturdy and how well made it was, bought another. It's perfect for our clumsy 6 yr old, who typically has issues with standard swiveling or rolling desk chairs. Definitely a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tillulu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids chair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair for kids. I use this for homeschool with my son at a regular computer desk and it works nicely. It doesn't provide much distraction as it doesn't spin or tilt as the computer chair does. It is a hard plastic and looks very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Bigskygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, height adjustment tedious
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chair for kids and adults. A little tedious to adjust the height (you have to unscrew it and then res crew it), but great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We liked this chair so much for our 10 year old’s desk that we ordered one for our 12 year old’s room too. It is the perfect chair to pair with a child’s desk without spending tons of money. I have sat in it and it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, very comfy! It fits my (very tall) 8 year old at the lowest setting, so plenty of room to grow. The seat is contoured. Fabulous purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Too small :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 ft 3 in and this chair is still too small.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for homework, my son loves it. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Yara

customer_reviews.title: Took three tries to get working parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and both sets needed replacement parts because the holes were not drilled properly or did not line up properly. They are great once assembled, but one must test each and every setting of holes you may need to use in the future in order to ensure they will work properly when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Saving Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Sturdy! Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Was looking for a chair for my 4 1/2 yr old to use in our newly renovated office. Wanted something black without wheels...this fit the bill. It is very sturdy and has good weight to it so any fidgeting won't topple her over. Super easy to put together. Great find, great value!
customer_reviews.author: AKR, New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair for my 9 year old and it’s perfect! She loves it! We just put it together today but didn’t take long and came with everything needed!
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: Cushion or attention span
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year says his back hurts and keeps sliding off! Considering he does not want to do homework during a global pandemic may have something to do with it. We’re keeping the chair and adding a seat cushion. I have no recommendations for a 6 year old’s attention span.
customer_reviews.author: Jame L. Day

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for elementary school kids!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome! Super solid, really easy to assemble, and I love that it’s adjustable as my son grows!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and very sturdy well made. Love that it has feet and you can not tip back easy. Just what I wanted. Great quality product and no issues. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: spittinfire

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old granddaughter and it is adjustable and so sturdy that it will last her at least five years for her growth
customer_reviews.author: Mj Nance

customer_reviews.title: love this chair
customer_reviews.text: very good durable for kids can't bend or destroy this chair better than the chairs at school
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Burks

customer_reviews.title: Decent chairs
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these last week. They put together easy and are very stable and appear to be able to take abuse from kids. The bottom has 4 rubber feet that grip well. Could be almost too well. Kids said they're comfortable and I like that they are adjustable and can grow with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: m7

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Adequate!
customer_reviews.text: My students (Gr. 3-5) seem to really enjoy sitting in these new “special” seats for choice seating in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mcsllew

customer_reviews.title: Great school desk
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for my sons homework desks. They give back support and keep them from tipping back on the chair
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just got my 2nd chair as I realized I don’t have anything to sit next to my child to do the “homework”. Wish there were different colors but at least it grows with my child.
customer_reviews.author: Endija Reid

customer_reviews.title: Sewing Chair
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses this chair for her sewing hobby. The chair is easier on her back and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Dan stewart

customer_reviews.title: Solid Children's Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: Sold chair that is great for a child’s desk. Only negative is the chair legs are significantly uneven and requires the leveling foot to be almost fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: Globetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 y/o son. Matched perfectly with desk table in a small area of bedroom. Sturdy and comfortable. Easy to assemble too. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. Was really easy to assemble and is very durable. Bought this for my 9 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Davison

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for small to mid size teens
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my children's rooms to use at a desk. My son put them together easily and they are adjustable in height. they are sturdy and should last until they outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: Cape St.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and light. Not just for kids. Adults fit too. It feels sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a school chair that way my child wouldn't be rolling around on the chair all day not paying attention. Good size for a child or adult.
customer_reviews.author: prnses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A perfect chair for my kid desk. Love it!! I bought a used chair from AMZ and just a scratch on it nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Zulrey

customer_reviews.title: I love that these will grow with the boys
customer_reviews.text: These chairs adjust height, so the boys can keep them, even when they get taller. They love them with their desks:)
customer_reviews.author: Anita Entringer

customer_reviews.title: Quality seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (other then predrilled holes on the bottom of the seat), arrived the next day with prime and very sturdy. Wanted a chair without wheels, as we have carpet and have little kids. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: The_science_professor

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what we needed!! Perfect for my kids 7 and 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons desk in his room. It’s easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Martin Family

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair was very easy to assemble. I’m a college student that needed a chair for my desk that wouldn’t break the back. This chair was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: April Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my preschool age son who needed a chair at his desk he could easily get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi W

customer_reviews.title: So so bad!
customer_reviews.text: I will not waste my time. I'm pretty good at putting things together but this was impossible. Put it back in the box and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cofar

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect for us. It is very sturdy and durable and can easily be adjusted. I really like that it has hooks on both sides for backpacks or other hanging items.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my grandson. No complaints from him. He’s online with school 5/days a week. At 9 years old he seems very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my preschoolers room for his desk. Nice, sturdy chair. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: No skid chair but is hard to move around getting to & from desk - no skid is almost a hinderance. Outside of that, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: One of the best kids chairs on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazingly strong and built to last. Solid construction and the adjustment height feature is a winner for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: perfect chairs for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: perfect chairs for the kiddos, super easy to put together, and pretty good quality they adjust in size so they will have them for a long time. no cushion so prob not great for hours of sitting but i knew that ahead of time :)
customer_reviews.author: amznshopper77

customer_reviews.title: Great for my grandson!
customer_reviews.text: Bought along with the desk for my grandson to do his homework an other projects on! The desk and chair should be sold as a set.
customer_reviews.author: HJNTEX

customer_reviews.title: Study chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy for this Nana to put together for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: laurel j.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: My Order didn’t come with instructions. I can’t get the legs to slide into the plastic part on the chair. Overall, once I figure it out, should be a really good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for home schooling
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found this! I home school and was struggling to find the right comfortable chair for my son. I have tried a few other options, but this is what we have been looking for! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It's small
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy chair but it is smaller than I expected. It works great for a child but really too small for an adult man.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! The chair pulls easily under the desk and doesn't take up much space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chair. Well made with lots of height adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Back of the chair broken after 1 month of causal ...
customer_reviews.text: Back of the chair broken after 1 month of causal use. not even repairable. My son is about 50 pounds, and only use the char about 20-30 mins a day during dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Adjustable Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set I have found for my daughter's needs to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Perfect desk heighth. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more adjustable on the height
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it could adjusted a little higher. If I don't it's not steady.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana Gonzalez-Saez

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old likes it.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to assemble. But works perfectly for my 6year old.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nix

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect since they are adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, perfect since they are adjustable. So they are good for different aged children in our home school.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henry

customer_reviews.title: The width is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Could have a longer seat base. The width is fine.
customer_reviews.author: knuckles

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. A little heavy for my six year old to move heck even for me to move. But, sits comfortably and I think it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TLewis

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to assemble and adjustable! It's also easy to move around and the perfect size for a child to use for the cello
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Chair
customer_reviews.text: It is quite easy to assemble, adjustable and very sturdy. It is well made with quality material and a great design. Great Amazon buy!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice student chair
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I think it will last a long time. Adjustable to his growth.
customer_reviews.author: Mizantoinette

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for a student. It was super easy to put together. Seems very durable! Glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Good for price and kids
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy, as expected. Using for a smaller desk for my grade school son to do homework. Wouldn’t recommend for larger adult or for long sits.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not good for anyone who has back and let problems/injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use with a matching student desk. It was really a pain to put together, however once it was assembled, it is very sturdy and easy to adjust. good purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: M. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Hard to readjust
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pain to put together. The holes inside the chair's legs wouldn't line up properly. It will be hard to readjust. But overall we liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaB

customer_reviews.title: Really strong
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my husband and I were surprised how sturdy it is. bought it for my 7 year old and I am not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. Sturdy, was easy to assemble and has held up against the trying times of a very wild child. Will be purchasing another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Amin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits the job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy to the point where even my destructive 7 year old hasn’t broken or compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: The chair is solid. It will outlast me for ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is solid. It will outlast me for sure. My only complain is that it is too tall for my 6 y.o. son even on the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dolby (Virginia)

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids desk chair
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy. Using it as a child's desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Annie_cali

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I received the chair, the package was in perfect condition. The instructions were very clear and easy to understand. My 10yr old son was able to do the whole thing. It is very steady.
customer_reviews.author: iris

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Adjustable Height Black Student Chair with Black Pedestal Frame
product_meta.description: This Student Chair is perfect to the classroom that is adjustable in height to fit children of all sizes. Chair features anti-slip floor glides that prevent it from slipping and also reduces noise. The pedestal frame provides extra stability around rambunctious children. [YU-YCX-09010-GG].
feature_bullets: Anti-Slip Floor Caps prevent chair from slipping and reduces any noise
Recommended for Elementary - High School Grade Students
